oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Davy Crockett portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of David Crockett (1786-1836) painted by S.S. Osgood. Portrait from waist up. He wears a dark suit, vest and necktie with a white collar that meets his jawline. Sideburns facial hair. Writing at bottom with signature and inscription: I am happy to acknowledge this to be the only correct likeness that has been taken of me.
Pioneer and U.S. Congressman from Tennessee, 1827-1831, 1833-1835.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836
Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836;Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836. Narrative of the life of David Crockett of the state of Tennessee;Tennessee. General Assembly

oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: S. S. Osgood
